author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a stub of `SiPixelDynamicInefficiency` payload inspector, for the moment only for the mapping of the inefficient ROCs behind broken DC/DC converters, currently included with the `SiPixelDynamicInefficiency`.
More updates will come later.
I profit of this PR to introduce in commit fbece95 default file names for the `SiPixelDetInfoFileReader` similarly to what has been done for Strips in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33888. 

#### PR validation:

The augmented unit test run, 
 
```console
scram b runtests
```

plus private validation, here's an example:

![SiPixelFullIneffROCfromDynIneffMap](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/125455091-449fbe34-867d-4f78-91b8-d36d66d9e244.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

cc:
@tvami @tsusa
title: Introduce `SiPixelDynamicInefficiency` payload inspector
